content: Hi, I need help with my account login. I can't access my dashboard.
I'm sorry to hear that! Let me help you troubleshoot. Are you seeing any error messages when you try to log in?
Yes, it says 'Invalid credentials' even though I'm sure my password is correct.

That's frustrating. Let's try a few things: 1) Make sure Caps Lock is off, 2) Try clearing your browser cache and cookies, 3) If that doesn't work, we can reset your password. Would you like me to send a password reset link to your email?
I tried clearing the cache but it still doesn't work. Yes, please send the reset link.

I've sent a password reset link to the email address associated with your account (ending in ...@gmail.com). Please check your inbox and spam folder. The link will expire in 1 hour. Let me know once you've reset it!
Got it! I reset my password and now I can log in. Thank you so much!

Excellent! I'm glad we could resolve this quickly. For future security, I recommend using a password manager and enabling two-factor authentication in your account settings. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, that's all. Thanks again for your help!
You're very welcome! If you need any assistance in the future, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
